sentences.en: And yet my state is supremely actual and , therefore , possible, realisable, attainable.
sentences.cn: 然而我的状态是超出感官经验的实在, 故此有可能 、 可实现和达成.

sentences.en: By selection of specific homologous mixtures, application advantages are attainable.
sentences.cn: 通过选择特定的同系物混合物, 可以达到应用性能的优化.

sentences.en: Ensure That Goals Are Perceived as Attainable.
sentences.cn: 确保个体认为目标是可达到的.

sentences.en: If objectives are to be meaningful to people, they must be clear, attainable, actionable, and verifiable.
sentences.cn: 如果目标对人们是具有意义的, 则目标必须是清晰的, 能达到的, 可以行动的, 以及可供检验的.

sentences.en: If the solutions are so attainable, why haven't we reached them already?
sentences.cn: 如果所有这些方案都这么可行, 为什么我们还是没能完全实现 呢 ?

sentences.en: It is unrealistic to believe perfection is an attainable goal.
sentences.cn: 相信完美可以企及是不现实的。

sentences.en: It was not all of them that were attainable.
sentences.cn: 它们也不是都可以涉足的.

sentences.en: Thanks to your leadership, Germany will be attainable as the homeland.
sentences.cn: 感谢你的领导, 德国将成为祖国.

sentences.en: The education of children must be conducted by the best attainable instructors.
sentences.cn: 儿童的教育必须由所能聘互的最好的教师来施行.

sentences.en: The goal of eliminating hunger by the turn of the century is attainable.
sentences.cn: 在两个世纪交替的时期,消除饥饿的目标是可以实现的.

sentences.en: The Sceptics followed Pyrrhon, who held that not all knowledge was attainable.
sentences.cn: 怀疑论学派主创者是皮瑞翁, 他认为所有的知识并非都是可得的.
这些目标一定可以达到.

sentences.en: They set the limits of performance attainable.
sentences.cn: 它们确定着可达到的运行限度.

sentences.en: When knowledge is everywhere and easily attainable, a new issue comes out.
sentences.cn: 当知识无所不在,又唾手可得时, 我们又面临一些新的问题.

sentences.en: With ordinary talents and extraordinary perseverance, all things are attainable.
sentences.cn: 平凡的才能加上非凡的毅力, 就可以成就任何事.

words.tran_cn: 可达到的,可实行的,能力范围内的

trans.tran_en: Something that is attainable can be achieved
